modelView:
{
      "type": "page",
      "name": "homepage",
      "scriptingLanguage": "JavaScript",
      "title": "Page Builder Home",
      "components": [
            {
                  "name": "pbAdminPages",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "staticData": [],
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.pbadmAdminPages"
            },
            {
                  "name": "pbPages",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "staticData": [],
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.pbadmNonAdmPages"
            },
            {
                  "name": "pageBlock",
                  "type": "block",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "adminPageForm",
                              "type": "form",
                              "label": "Page Builder Administration",
                              "nextButtonLabel": "Next",
                              "showInitially": false,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "adminPageList",
                                          "type": "list",
                                          "model": "pbAdminPages",
                                          "allowReload": false,
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "required": false,
                                          "pageSize": 0,
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "value": "CONSTANT_NAME",
                                          "onClick": "window.location.assign(currentSelection.PAGE_LINK);",
                                          "onLoad": "$adminPageForm.$visible = true;"
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "pageForm",
                              "type": "form",
                              "nextButtonLabel": "Next",
                              "showInitially": true,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "pageList",
                                          "type": "list",
                                          "model": "pbPages",
                                          "allowReload": false,
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "required": false,
                                          "pageSize": 0,
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "value": "CONSTANT_NAME",
                                          "onClick": "window.location.assign('/banner-sspb-test-app/customPage/page/' + currentSelection.CONSTANT_NAME);"
                                    }
                              ],
                              "label": "Runtime Pages"
                        }
                  ]
            }
      ]
}
